divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a very bright, amber, pulsating orb. I first noticed this orb because I pay great attention to the sky, day and night. I knew emmediately what it was. It was what i call a "watcher." I believe these are spiritual entities, and are not related to alien activity. I pulled over near Williams Nature Center on highway 68, in Mankato, Mn. I set up my tripod. I videotaped it for a short while, but opted to stop filming, because I have so much footage of the orbs. It was very close. I would say around 125 yards at the beginning of the event. I believe it came closer, as it flew in my direction. I have seen thousands of these in the last six months, and have studied their behavior, only to make startling discoveries. I thought this one was quite clear, bright, and beautifull. My feelings while viewing this orb were nearing boredom. I have seen and taped many much closer than this. I have spent alot of time in the dark with a camera. I prefer the low flyovers. The watchers are exciting to videotape, when there is more than one in the view, and they interact. Either way, I have not lost interest, and still tape when it is clear. I lost sight of this object, because I lost interest and looked away. They are plentifull.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Mankato
There were no other sightings in Mankato on or around February 14th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
